span.span: Applies in parallel an accumulator function over a sequence.

summary.span: 這個多載不能用於循序實作。

span.span: This overload is not available in the sequential implementation.
The transformed final accumulator value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載是特別針對平行查詢。This overload is specific to parallelized queries. 平行化的查詢可能會將資料來源序列分割成許多子序列 （分割區）。A parallelized query may partition the data source sequence into several sub-sequences (partitions). `updateAccumulatorFunc`資料分割中的每個項目上叫用。The `updateAccumulatorFunc` is invoked on each element within partitions. 每個分割區，然後產生單一的累計的結果。Each partition then yields a single accumulated result. `combineAccumulatorsFunc`則會叫用來產生單一項目每個資料分割的結果。The `combineAccumulatorsFunc` is then invoked on the results of each partition to yield a single element. 這個項目會接著轉換`resultSelector`函式。This element is then transformed by the `resultSelector` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會處理平行的查詢的特定項目。This overload is specific to processing a parallelized query. 平行化的查詢可能會將資料來源序列分割成許多子序列 （分割區）。A parallelized query may partition the data source sequence into several sub-sequences (partitions). `updateAccumulatorFunc`資料分割中的每個項目上叫用。The `updateAccumulatorFunc` is invoked on each element within partitions. 每個分割區，然後產生單一的累計的結果。Each partition then yields a single accumulated result. `combineAccumulatorsFunc`則會叫用來產生單一項目每個資料分割的結果。The `combineAccumulatorsFunc` is then invoked on the results of each partition to yield a single element. 這個項目會接著轉換`resultSelector`函式。This element is then transformed by the `resultSelector` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何一個方法的這個多載會導致完整緩衝處理的合併，以傳回結果之前執行。This overload of the Any method causes a fully-buffered merge to be performed before the result is returned. 合併行為可以會影響效能或記憶體不足例外狀況會導致大型的可列舉值。The merge behavior can impact performance or cause an out of memory exception in large enumerables. 若要避免合併行為，使用任何參數的函式多載，或是使用例如 FirstOrDefault 替代方法。To avoid the merge behavior, use the overload of Any that takes a Func parameter, or else use an alternative method such as FirstOrDefault.

span.span: The source sequence which will maintain the original ordering in the subsequent query operators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自然的張力之間存在效能維持在平行處理的順序。A natural tension exists between performance and preserving order in parallel processing. 根據預設，平行化的查詢運作，除非只有套用，或在查詢中沒有明確的 OrderBy 運算子結果的順序是任意的。By default, a parallelized query behaves as if the ordering of the results is arbitrary unless AsOrdered is applied or there is an explicit OrderBy operator in the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 中的順序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

summary.span: 只有在由 AsParallel、ParallelEnumerable.Range 和 ParallelEnumerable.Repeat 傳回的泛型序列上，才可叫用 AsOrdered。

span.span: AsOrdered may only be invoked on generic sequences returned by AsParallel, ParallelEnumerable.Range, and ParallelEnumerable.Repeat.

returns.span: 將維持後續查詢運算子內原始順序的來源序列。

span.span: The source sequence which will maintain the original ordering in the subsequent query operators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自然的張力之間存在效能維持在平行處理的順序。A natural tension exists between performance and preserving order in parallel processing. 根據預設，平行化的查詢運作，除非只有套用，或在查詢中沒有明確的 OrderBy 運算子結果的順序是任意的。By default, a parallelized query behaves as if the ordering of the results is arbitrary unless AsOrdered is applied or there is an explicit OrderBy operator in the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 中的順序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源的 partitioner GetOrderedPartitions 排序時，方法使用已啟用，而如果不排序，則用 partitioner GetPartitions 啟用 （預設值）。The source partitioner's GetOrderedPartitions method is used when ordering is enabled, whereas the partitioner's GetPartitions is used if ordering is not enabled (the default). 不會使用來源的 partitioner GetDynamicPartitions 和 GetDynamicOrderedPartitions。The source partitioner's GetDynamicPartitions and GetDynamicOrderedPartitions are not used. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱 < [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

.method public static hidebysig class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> AsUnordered<TSource>(class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsUnordered(Of TSource) (source As ParallelQuery(Of TSource)) As ParallelQuery(Of TSource)
static member AsUnordered : System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source> -> System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source>

span.span: The type of elements of .

param.name: source
param.span: 輸入序列。

span.span: The input sequence.

summary.span: 允許將中繼查詢當做項目之中未套用順序的方式來進行處理。

span.span: Allows an intermediate query to be treated as if no ordering is implied among the elements.

returns.span: 具有任意順序的來源序列。

span.span: The source sequence with arbitrary order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks AsUnordered 順序不一定要在查詢的一部分時，可能會提供效能優勢。AsUnordered may provide performance benefits when ordering is not required in a portion of a query. 根據預設，PLINQ 視為輸入的序列未排序除非在指定的排序方式] 或 [AsOrdered。By default, PLINQ treats an input sequence as unordered unless OrderBy or AsOrdered is specified. 不過，如果排序已開啟，而且不再需要然後 AsUnordered 可用來在中間的查詢中，將它關閉，而且這可能會導致效能優勢。AsUnordered 運算子本身隨機來源序列中，不執行它只會移除後續運算子的順序需求。However, if ordering was turned on and is no longer needed, then AsUnordered can be used to turn it off in mid-query, and this may result in performance benefits.The AsUnordered operator itself does not shuffle the source sequence; it simply removes the ordering requirement for subsequent operators. 如果來源經過排序，後續的運算子可能會保留該順序，如果是更有效率，若要這樣做。If the source is ordered, subsequent operators might keep that ordering if it is more efficient to do so. 可以任何位置呼叫 AsUnordered，在查詢中;它不需要呼叫 AsParallel 的後面。AsUnordered can be called anywhere in the query; it does not need to be called immediately after AsParallel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 認識 PLINQ 中的加速](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/understanding-speedup-in-plinq.md)並[PLINQ 中的順序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Understanding Speedup in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/understanding-speedup-in-plinq.md) and [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

.method public static hidebysig class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> Concat<TSource>(class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> first, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> second) cil managed

static member Concat : System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source> * seq<'Source> -> System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The second data source of a binary operator must be of type System.Linq.ParallelQuery<T> rather than System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>. To fix this problem, use the AsParallel() extension method to convert the right data source to System.Linq.ParallelQuery<T>.")

param.span: 不使用這個參數。

span.span: This parameter is not used.

param.span: 不使用這個參數。

span.span: This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 永遠不可叫用這個 Concat 多載。

span.span: This Concat overload should never be called.

summary.span: 此方法已標記為過時，呼叫它時永遠會擲回 。

span.span: This method is marked as obsolete and always throws when called.
This overload always throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許使用 Concat 與左側的資料來源的型別和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Concat with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 Concat 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Concat operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

exception.span: 當呼叫這個方法時所發生的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that occurs when this method is called.

This overload always throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許使用左邊的資料來源類型為 Except和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Except with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 Except 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Except operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

This overload always throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許使用左邊的資料來源類型為 Except和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Except with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 Except 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Except operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是有效的方式來處理平行查詢的輸出，因為它不需要在結束合併步驟。This is an efficient way to process the output from a parallelized query because it does not require a merge step at the end. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [PLINQ 中的合併選項](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/merge-options-in-plinq.md)或是[PLINQ 中的順序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Merge Options in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/merge-options-in-plinq.md) or [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md). 這個方法會產生副作用，因為它可用來觀察平行查詢執行的實際順序。Because this method produces a side-effect, it can be used to observe the actual order of execution in a parallel query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允許使用 GroupJoin 左邊的資料來源類型為存在的這個多載和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of GroupJoin with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 GroupJoin 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the GroupJoin operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允許使用 GroupJoin 左邊的資料來源類型為存在的這個多載和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of GroupJoin with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 GroupJoin 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the GroupJoin operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許的聯結的使用方式，與左側的資料來源的型別和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Join with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則為聯結運算子來繫結至平行實作中，會出現，但會實際上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Join operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

exception.span: 當呼叫這個方法時所發生的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that occurs when this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相較於循序實作中，這不是穩定的排序。In contrast to the sequential implementation, this is not a stable sort. 若要達到穩定的排序，變更 形式的查詢： 已排序的 var = 來源。Select((e,i) = > 新的 {E = e、 I = i})。OrderBy((v) = > v.e)。ThenBy (v = > v.i)。Select((v) = > v.e);To achieve a stable sort, change a query of the form: var ordered = source.Select((e,i) => new { E=e, I=i }).OrderBy((v) => v.e).ThenBy(v => v.i).Select((v) => v.e);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允許使用 SequenceEqual 左邊的資料來源類型為存在的這個多載和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of SequenceEqual with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 SequenceEqual 運算子似乎繫結至平行實作中，但會事實上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the SequenceEqual operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

To fix this problem, use the AsParallel() extension method to convert the right data source to System.Linq.ParallelQuery<T>.")

span.span: This method is marked as obsolete and always throws when called.
This overload always throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許使用左側的資料來源類型的等位和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Union with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則為等位運算子來繫結至平行實作中，會出現，但會實際上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Union operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行模式會指定 PLINQ 是否會嘗試回復為循序執行如果它偵測到特定的查詢圖形。The execution mode specifies whether PLINQ will attempt to fall back to sequential execution if it detects certain query shapes. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[How to:在 PLINQ 中指定的執行模式](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-execution-mode-in-plinq.md)。For more information and examples, see [How to: Specify the Execution Mode in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-execution-mode-in-plinq.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載存在不允許使用類型的左的資料來源的 Zip和正確的資料來源的型別。This overload exists to disallow usage of Zip with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否則 Zip 運算子，看起來是繫結至平行實作中，但會實際上繫結到循序實作。Otherwise, the Zip operator would appear to be bind to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.
